title: Stargate.SG-1.Season.8.x264.ac3.subs-HighQuality
description:
This is a high quality, full resolution, high profile h264 dvd rip of Stargate SG-1 - Season 8.  These files may be a little large for some.  But if you aren't worried about space, and want a higher quality, then this is for you.  I've previewed the episodes and they look and sound great on a 50 inch lcd/surround sound system.

Stargate SG-1
Season 8, episodes 1-20

Source: DVD Rip
Average File Size: 625mb
(note: the file size is a little larger than previous seasons, by 25mb, in order to accommodate the extra audio track (French).

Container: MKV
Video: x264
Audio 1: English, AC3 passthru, 5.1 channel
Audio 2: French, AC3 passthru, Dolby Surround
Audio 3: English-Director's Commentary, AC3 passthru, Dolby Surround

(Note: Episode 18, "Threads", does not contain a Director's Commentary track.  There was no Director's Commentary track on the original DVD. However, English and French tracks are included.)

Subtitles: English srt (in MKV)


Please seed when you are done...a good rule of thumb is to upload at least as much as you've downloaded...thanks!!


p.s. I ripped many of the subtitles myself, but also used subtitles that I found online.  I did re-sync and perform spot checks and they seem fine.  However I can't guarantee the accuracy of the subs since I didn't rip them myself.  Thanks to those who did.

p.s.s. ATT PS3 MEDIA SERVER (which I use for these) USERS: These files may not work properly with TSMuxer...use the MEncoder engine(default) instead. Also if using MEncoder, if you have problems with audio sync, try unchecking AV/Sync Alternative Method.
